sections.heading: Effect of changing circumstances of bonds; agreement of state5-541
sections.text: Effect of changing circumstances of bonds; agreement of stateA. An amendment of any provision of this article does not diminish or impair the validity of bonds issued under this article or the remedies and rights of bondholders.B. Th
